source.name: Current Population Survey Public Participation in the Arts Supplement
source.description: A national survey conducted to obtain information on type and frequency of adult participation in the arts; training and exposure (particularly while young), and their musical and artistic activity preferences.  The universe for this survey is each household member age 18 or older.  The survey is a self and proxy response supplement that is sponsored by the National Endowment for the Arts (NEA).
